title: League of Legends on LInux Problem
body: I ve been trying to run LoL on Linux,but the same error comes.It says Invalid command line,I did everything,installed wine,winetricks,directx9 etc...Could someone please help me?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, League doesn't have any official support for Linux, so I can't directly assist you in troubleshooting your issues. I strongly recommend reaching out to one of the awesome Linux Support Communities below for assistance with troubleshooting this issue:

* The [**Linux_Gaming Subreddit**](https://www.reddit.com/r/linux_gaming/)
* The [**Wine Forums**](https://forum.winehq.org/)
* The [**PlayOnLinux Forums**](https://www.playonlinux.com/en/forums.html)

Best of luck out there, Linux friend!
